WindowShowSaveFilePicker.summary:
The showSaveFilePicker() method of the
interface shows a file picker that allows a user to save a file.
Either by selecting an existing file, or entering a name for a new file.

remarks.para:
-File System Access API
-The File System Access API: simplifying access to local files

WindowShowSaveFilePicker.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} whose fulfillment handler receives a object.
